column4: No one knows how to run a program after it was installed with wine under unity...ubuntu 11.10?
make the file executable from the properties option then run it from wine
which application are you trying to run in wine?
and just a piece of advice dont use internet explorer you will need to do tons of settings use firefox, opera or google chrome these 3 are most popular atleast for ubuntu
Trust me on this. I have a website that only works on ie. What am I supposed to use?:)
use virtualbox on ur system, install your favourite windows os, and get started
haha I forgot about this one. Thanks:)
you use wine 1.3 branch? you use the unstable one right?
can you suggest which windows programs have you currently tested on YOUR system and which worked better?
But unfortunately I need IE for running a website, which is stupid but again I need it.
